title: Bumper2Bumper can Get Your Vehicle Look as Good as New!
text: Bumper2Bumper can Get Your Vehicle Look as Good as New! United States, 8 October 2015 -- Bumper2Bumper is your expert on autobody in Atascadero that aims to save you time and money. They are your top choice if you are in need of any type of auto body repair, paintless dent repair, windshield repair, paint touch-up, and bumper repair. Whether you have a door ding, windshield crack, dent, fender bender or scraped bumper, they can get you back on the road in no time without any hassle or long waits.Bumper2Bumper Auto Body Repair has been in the business for 15 years and is proud to be a member of the Better Business Bureau and The Bureau of Automotive Repair. The amount of time they have spent in the industry is all because of their loyal customers and supporters. Through the years, Bumper2Bumper has always been updated with the newest technology trends and techniques to deliver their customers with the best of services, handling every autobody in Atascadero with great care and precision. Their goal is to provide the best services at competitive prices. If you are in need of auto body repair or minor collision repair, they can take care of the dents, scrapes and scratches. They use PPG paint which has been on the forefront of automotive coating innovations. This is used to match your paint code to get the most accurate paint match possible. Bumper2Bumper combines PPG, their modern techniques in auto body repair and their innovative strategies to ensure that you are getting the best quality outcomes at the best possible prices. All of their work is covered by insurances. They can also set up a rental car through Enterprise Rent-A-Car for free or at a discounted rate so that you can go about with your schedule while your car is being fixed! If you are looking for paintless dent repair in Atascadero , their staff can fix your dents in a matter of hours rather than in a couple of weeks. They know that dings and dents are common and sometimes unavoidable, and these can be can be just plain annoying for any car owner. These issues can be a hassle, especially if you have to bring them in a car shop and wait for days or even weeks to get it fixed, even if it only requires minor repairs. At Bumper2Bumper, however, they can effectively repair all types of dents and damages in the shortest time possible. Plus, they give free estimates that only take a few minutes where they also explain the process and how they will go about it. Bumper2Bumper are also experts on windshield repairs. They understand how frustrating it is to have small rocks bounce and hurl off the highway and straight into your windshield, which can result to windshield cracks and chips that can pose great risk in driving. For this reason, it is best to get it repaired immediately. The companyâ€™s team can repair the damage quickly and save you the cost of replacement when the latter is not necessary. They use the same process as Safelite, but their repairs cost half the price and can be completed in only 15 minutes. If you wish to have any paint touch-up, it is an effective solution for your minor paint wear and tear damages such as rock chips, nicks and small key scratches. Their staff will no longer have to repaint the whole panel of your car, thus saving you from the cost of a complete painting job. With the use of high-end airbrushes, touch-up guns, and special polishes, they are able to efficiently fill and remove the small scratches and chips. The company can also repair all types of bumper damage, from simple scrapes to large dents. They are able to fix your bumper damage for less simply because they do repairs rather than replacements, especially for minor damages. Also, many of their repairs cost cheaper than most deductibles. Bumper2Bumper aims towards saving you time and money. They have a quick and affordable process that guarantees your vehicle to last a lifetime. You can simply drop by their shop, contact them via email, or give them a call so they can give you a free estimate. Whether you have a door ding, windshield crack, fender bender or scraped bumper, they will do everything they can to get your car back on the road without any hassle or long waits. They like to keep things simple. Collisions are left to the collision shops while Bumper2Bumper tries to stay with body damage repairs that to not require any frame straightening, welding or weeks of downtime, although they do accept insurance work. Bumper2Bumper Auto Body Repair prides itself in delivering quality, quick services and low cost repairs to their customers. If you are in need of dent repair in Atascadero , windshield repair, or any other type of repair services for your vehicle, they will be more than willing to help you out. They do not claim to be the biggest and best collision shop around, but they can guarantee quality services every time to ensure that client expectations will be met, if not exceeded. # # #
